DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from Brocade VDX switches.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastFormatter.condition: .*\[severity@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[class@\d+ value="(\w+)"\].*\[ip@\d+ value="([\d.]+)"\]\[interface@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[application@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[swname@\d+ value="([-\w]+)"\].*
FastFormatter.format: Severity: "$6", Class: "$7", IP: "$8", Interface: "$9", Application: "$10", Switch: "$11"

FastFormatter.condition: .*\[severity@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[class@\d+ value="(\w+)"\].*\[ip@\d+ value="([\d.]+)"\]\[interface@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[application@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[swname@\d+ value="([-\w]+)"\].*
FastFormatter.format: Severity: "$6", Class: "$7", IP: "$8", Interface: "$9", Application: "$10", Switch: "$11"

FastFormatter.condition: firmware download command has completed successfully

.*\[severity@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[class@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[user@\d+ value="([^"]+)"\].*\[ip@\d+ value="([\d.]+)"\]\[interface@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[application@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[swname@\d+ value="([-\w]+)"\].*
FastFormatter.format: Severity: "$6", Class: "$7", IP: "$9", Interface: "$10", Application: "$11", Switch: "$12", User: "$8"

FastFormatter.condition: .*\[severity@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[class@\d+ value="(\w+)"\].*\[ip@\d+ value="([\d.]+)"\]\[interface@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[application@\d+ value="(\w+)"\]\[swname@\d+ value="([-\w]+)"\].*

FastFormatter.format: Severity: "$6", Class: "$7", IP: "$8", Interface: "$9", Application: "$10", Switch: "$11"

FastFormatter.condition: Event: [\w ]+, Status: \w+, Info: Successful logout by user \[(.+)\]
Event: ([\w ]+), Status: \w+, Info: Successful logout by user \[.+\]
Event: [\w ]+, Status: \w+, Info: Successful logout by user \[(.+)\]
Event: ([\w ]+), Status: \w+, Info: Successful logout by user \[.+\]
Event: [\w ]+, Status: \w+, Info: Successful login attempt through \w+ from ([\d.]+)
Event: ([\w ]+), Status: \w+, Info: Successful login attempt through (\w+) from [\d.]+
Login information: Login successful via TELNET/SSH/RSH\. IP Addr: ([\d.]+)
Event: [\w ]+, Status: \w+, Info: Successful login attempt via (\w+), IP Addr: ([\d.]+)
Login information: Login successful via TELNET/SSH/RSH\. IP Addr: ([\d.]+)
Login information: Login successful via ([/\w]+)\. IP Addr: [\d.]+
Event: [\w ]+, Status: \w+, Info: Successful login attempt via ([/\w]+), IP Addr: [\d.]+
Event: [\w ]+, Status: \w+, Info: Failed login attempt through (\w+), IP Addr: ([\d.]+)
Event: [\w ]+, Status: \w+, Info: Failed login attempt through \w+, IP Addr: ([\d.]+)
Event: [\w ]+, Status: \w+, Info: Failed login attempt through ([/\w]+), IP Addr: [\d.]+
Security violation: Login failure attempt via TELNET/SSH/RSH\. IP Addr: ([\d.]+)
Security violation: Login failure attempt via TELNET/SSH/RSH\. IP Addr: ([\d.]+)
Security violation: Login failure attempt via TELNET/SSH/RSH\. IP Addr: ([\d.]+)
Security violation: Login failure attempt via ([/\w]+)\. IP Addr: [\d.]+

FastFormatter.format: Severity: "$6", Class: "$7", IP: "$8", Interface: "$9", Application: "$10", Switch: "$11"
